feed.title: TheDesk Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for TheDesk: TheDesk 25.0.10(Aiko)
entry.content:
• Add desktop notification (Limit: Only show notifications for accounts with a notification column)
  • Hardware acceleration can now be disabled in the configuration file
  • DNS over HTTPS can now be disabled in the configuration file
  • Add TTS with bouyomi chan #3
  • Fonts can be changed

Full Changelog: https://github.com/cutls/thedesk-next/compare/v25.0.3...v25.0.10

entry.title: New release for TheDesk: TheDesk 25.0.11(Aiko)
entry.content:
• Add vertical stacking in https://github.com/cutls/thedesk-next/pull/5
  • Fix composer box stays open after editing #4
  • Add D&D to upload, Ctrl+V to upload
  • Add context menu on composer textarea
  • NowPlaying template can be edited
  • Improve focus behavior with keyboard shortcut in Status component
  • Fix Spotify connect failed

Full Changelog: https://github.com/cutls/thedesk-next/compare/v25.0.10...v25.0.11

entry.title: New release for TheDesk: TheDesk 25.0.12(Aiko)
entry.content:
25.0.11->12

  • fix: type n or m to focus
  • fix: unneccesary schema
  • prevent 404 after reload

25.0.10->11

  • Add vertical stacking in https://github.com/cutls/thedesk-next/pull/5
  • Fix composer box stays open after editing #4
  • Add D&D to upload, Ctrl+V to upload
  • Add context menu on composer textarea
  • NowPlaying template can be edited
  • Improve focus behavior with keyboard shortcut in Status component
  • Fix Spotify connect failed

Full Changelog: https://github.com/cutls/thedesk-next/compare/v25.0.10...v25.0.11

entry.title: New release for TheDesk: TheDesk 25.0.13(Aiko)
entry.content:
25.0.12 -> 13

  • Fix: whiteout when reloading (Ctrl+R) [WIP]
  • Feat: search selected text with Google
  • Feat: download and copy image
  • Fix reorder timeline bug

25.0.11->12

  • fix: type n or m to focus
  • fix: unneccesary schema
  • prevent 404 after reload

25.0.10->11

  • Add vertical stacking in https://github.com/cutls/thedesk-next/pull/5
  • Fix composer box stays open after editing #4
  • Add D&D to upload, Ctrl+V to upload
  • Add context menu on composer textarea
  • NowPlaying template can be edited
  • Improve focus behavior with keyboard shortcut in Status component
  • Fix Spotify connect failed

Full Changelog: https://github.com/cutls/thedesk-next/compare/v25.0.10...v25.0.11

entry.title: New release for TheDesk: TheDesk 25.0.14(Aiko)
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Feat: streaming of all columns with single connection by @cutls in https://github.com/cutls/thedesk-next/pull/8
  • Fix: in delete server, wrongly delete columns not with the server
  • Fix: #7 wrongly disabled mark as read notification button
  • Fix: (beta) receive delete event on Misskey(posts of only of received via streaming)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/cutls/thedesk-next/compare/v25.0.13...v25.0.14

Known problems

  • Cannot connect to streaming of LTL on social.vivaldi.net
